r1.name: Demacian Justice
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Garen''' calls upon the might of ''Demacia'' onto the target enemy {{tip|champion}}, dealing them {{sti|{{as|true damage}}}}.
The target is {{tip|true sight|revealed}} for 1 second starting from the beginning of the cast time.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Garen calls upon the might of Demacia onto the target enemy champion, dealing them true damage.
The target is revealed for 1 second starting from the beginning of the cast time.
leveling: {{st|True Damage|{{ap|150 to 450}} {{as|(+ {{ap|20 to 30}}% of target's '''missing''' health)}}}}
r1.notes:
* ''Demacian Justice'' is cancelled and does not go on {{sti|cooldown}} under the following circumstances:
** The target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}.
** The target leaves {{tip|sight}} [[range]] while '''Garen''' is {{tip|nearsight|nearsighted}}.
** The target is too far away.
** The target dies.
* The target will die if they're at least under {{as|{{ap|(20 to 30)/(1+(20 to 30)/100)|round=2}}% '''maximum''' health}} + {{as|{{ap|(150 to 450)/(1+(20 to 30)/100)|round=2}} '''flat''' health}} on top of that. This does not count effects that mitigate [[true damage]], such as {{tip|shield|shields}}.

effects.str: • True Damage: (+ % of target's missing health)

i1.name: Perseverance
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Garen''' {{sti|health regeneration|link=true|regenerates}}{{ft|{{as|{{pp|key=%|1.5+0.2*(x-1) for 6;then + 0.8*x for 7; then + 0.4*x|formula=1.3%+0.2 per level up to level 6, then+0.8% up to level 13, then+0.4%}} of his {{sti|'''maximum''' health}}}} every 5 seconds.|{{as|{{pp|key=%|(1.5+0.2*(x-1))/10 for 6;then + 0.8/10*x for 7; then + 0.4/10*x|formula=0.13%+0.02% per level up to level 6, then+0.08% up to level 13, then+0.04%}} of his {{sti|'''maximum''' health}}}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds.}}

'''Garen''' loses ''Perseverance'' for {{tt|8 seconds|Not a cooldown, unaffected by ability haste}} if he takes damage from epic {{tip|monster|monsters}}, enemy {{tip|turret|turrets}}, or enemy {{tip|champion|champions}}, or if he is hit by an enemy [[Champion ability|ability]] or affected by an enemy [[summoner spell]], refreshing on subsequent damage or hits to '''Garen''' from them.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Garen regenerates
Garen loses Perseverance for 8 seconds if he takes damage from epic monsters, enemy turrets, or enemy champions, or if he is hit by an enemy Champion ability or affected by an enemy summoner spell, refreshing on subsequent damage or hits to Garen from them.
i1.notes: * ''Perseverance'' does not go on nor refresh its cooldown from damage which was fully prevented by a {{tip|shield}} or {{tip|invulnerability}}.

w1.name: Courage
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Garen''' gains {{sti|armor|{{as|{{fd|0.2}} '''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|{{fd|0.2}} '''bonus''' magic resistance}}}} every time he kills an enemy, up to a maximum of 30 '''bonus''' resistances at 150 unit kills.
After reaching maximum stacks, '''Garen''' gains {{as|10% '''bonus''' armor}} and {{as|10% '''bonus''' magic resistance}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Garen''' {{tip|Damage reduction|reduces}} incoming damage by 30% for a few seconds. For the first {{fd|0.75}} seconds, '''Garen''' additionally gains a {{tip|shield}} and 60% {{tip|tenacity}}.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Garen gains 0.2 bonus armor and 0.2 bonus magic resistance every time he kills an enemy, up to a maximum of 30 bonus resistances at 150 unit kills.
After reaching maximum stacks, Garen gains 10% bonus armor and 10% bonus magic resistance.
Active: Garen reduces incoming damage by 30% for a few seconds. For the first 0.75 seconds, Garen additionally gains a shield and 60% tenacity.
w1.notes:
* ''Courage's'' bonus resistances are only gained when it is ranked up at least once, but ''Courage's'' passive is retroactive for units killed before it was learned.
* {{pending for test}}: ''Courage's'' '''bonus''' resistances can be obtained by any of '''Garen's''' damage sources (basic attacks, abilities, summoner spells, item actives).
** This does not include ''last hits'' transferred to '''Garen''' artificially, through effects such as {{ii|Relic Shield|Spoils of War}}.
* The kills on these enemy unit types count towards ''Courage's'' '''bonus''' resistances:
** {{tip|champion|Champions}} ([[kill]]s and {{pending for test}}: [[assist]]s)
** All {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monster|monsters}}
** [[Champion summoned units]] (e.g. {{ai|Noxious Trap|Teemo}}, {{ai|Powder Keg|Gangplank}}, {{ai|Dark Procession|Yorick}})
** All {{tip|pet|pets}} and {{tip|clone|clones}}.
*** The bonus is equal for all these units; ''Large'' units do not grant a larger bonus.
* The kills on these enemy unit types do '''not''' count towards ''Courage's'' '''bonus''' resistances:
** {{tip|Wards}}.
** {{tip|Turrets}} (including {{ai|Shurima's Legacy|Azir|Sun Disk}}) and other [[structures]]
** [[Jungle plants]].
** Units destroyed by 'trampling' such as {{cai|Rampant Growth|Zyra|seeds}}, {{cai|Cell Division|Zac|goo}} or {{cai|Tunnel|Rek'Sai|tunnels}}.
* ''Courage'' will only grant bonus resistances from units killed by '''Garen''' himself. {{ii|Eye of the Herald}} and {{ii|Relic Shield|Spoils of War}} of allies do not count.
* The {{tip|Tenacity}} increase {{tip|stacks additively}} with the ''tenacity reduction'' from {{tip|Brittle}}, but multiplicatively with other sources.
w1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|23 to 15}}|Starts on cast}}' as '0/20.333/17.667/15/12.333/0' and riot's value '23,21,19,17,15' as '23/21/19/17/15'

effects.str:
• Duration:

  • Shield Strength: (+ 20% bonus health)

e1.name: Judgment
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Garen''' becomes {{tip|ghosted}} and rapidly spins his sword around his body 7 times over 3 seconds, losing the ability to basic attack but gaining an [[aura]] that deals {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies periodically. The number of spins is increased by 1 for every {{as|25% '''bonus''' attack speed}} from [[item]] [[champion statistic|stats]], [[Mythic item|mythic]] passives, and [[growth|growth (per level)]]. Enemy champions hit 6 times have their {{sti|armor penetration|{{as|armor reduced by 25%}}}} for 6 seconds. The 7th hit and every 6th hit thereafter refreshes the armor reduction's duration. ''Judgment'' can be recast after 1 second for its duration, and does so automatically after its duration ends.
The nearest enemy is dealt 25% '''bonus''' damage.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Garen''' ends ''Judgment'' early, reducing its {{sti|cooldown}} by its remaining duration.

''Judgment'' can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for  {{as|{{critical damage|58|100}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}. Additionally, ''Judgment'' deals 150% damage against non-epic {{tip|monsters}}.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Garen becomes ghosted and rapidly spins his sword around his body 7 times over 3 seconds, losing the ability to basic attack but gaining an aura that deals physical damage to nearby enemies periodically. The number of spins is increased by 1 for every 25% bonus attack speed from item champion statistic, Mythic item passives, and growth. Enemy champions hit 6 times have their armor reduced by 25% for 6 seconds. The 7th hit and every 6th hit thereafter refreshes the armor reduction's duration. Judgment can be recast after 1 second for its duration, and does so automatically after its duration ends.
The nearest enemy is dealt 25% bonus damage.
Recast: Garen ends Judgment early, reducing its cooldown by its remaining duration.
Judgment can critically strike for (+ IE 25%) bonus physical damage. Additionally, Judgment deals 150% damage against non-epic monsters.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage Per Spin|{{ap|4 to 20}} (+ {{pp|0.8*(x-1) for 9;then + 0.2*x|formula=0.8 per level until lvl 9, then+0.2 per level}}) {{as|(+ {{ap|32 to 40}}% AD)}}}}
e1.notes:
*The initial casts count as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
**Deactivating the ability manually does not.
* Each spin triggers a stack of {{ri|Conqueror}}.
* For the purpose of moving closer to an enemy when right clicking them, ''Judgment'' also reduces '''Garen's''' {{sti|attack range|link=range}} {{ft|to 100|by 75}} for the duration.
* ''Judgment'' cancels '''Garen's''' last movement command upon ending.
* Each spin deals damage simultaneously to all enemies within its range when the spin is completed.
* The spin animation is capped at once per {{fd|0.2}} seconds, but the amount of ticks will keep on scaling.
* The armor reduction stacks multiplicatively with other percentage armor penetration effects.
{{ct|attack=false|cast=[[File:Decisive_Strike.png|20px|link=Garen#Decisive_Strike]] [[Garen#Decisive_Strike|Decisive Strike]] and [[File:Courage.png|20px|link=Garen#Courage]] [[Garen#Courage|Courage]] are usable. [[File:Demacian_Justice.png|20px|link=Garen#Demacian_Justice]] [[Garen#Demacian_Justice|Demacian Justice]] interrupts.|move=true|items=true|consume=true|spells=true,true,true,false,true|interrupts=death}}
e1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|9|Starts post-effect}}' as '9/0' and riot's value '9,9,9,9,9' as '9'

effects.str: • Physical Damage Per Spin: (+ 0.8*(x-1) for 9;then + 0.2*xundefined − (based on level)) (+ % AD)

st_slices: (+ 0.8*(x-1) for 9;then + 0.2*xundefined − (based on level)) (+ % AD)

effects.str: • Nearest Enemy Damage Per Spin: (+ 0.8*(x-1)*1.25 for 9;then + 0.2*x*1.25undefined − (based on level)) (+ % AD)

st_slices: (+ 0.8*(x-1)*1.25 for 9;then + 0.2*x*1.25undefined − (based on level)) (+ % AD)

q1.name: Decisive Strike
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Garen''' {{tip|cleanse|cleanses}} himself of all {{tip|slow|slows}} and gains {{sti|ms|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for a few seconds.

Additionally, '''Garen's''' next [[basic attack]] within {{fd|4.5}} seconds has an {{tip|uncancelable windup}}, {{tip|lunge|lunges}} at the target, deals {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, and {{tip|silence|silences}} the target for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
''Decisive Strike'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Garen's''' basic attack timer.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Garen cleanses himself of all slows and gains 30% bonus movement speed for a few seconds.
Additionally, Garen's next basic attack within 4.5 seconds has an uncancelable windup, lunges at the target, deals bonus physical damage, and silences the target for 1.5 seconds.
Decisive Strike resets Garen's basic attack timer.
q1.notes:
* The enhanced attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal (the bonus damage does not).
** The bonus damage will also apply {{sti|life steal}}.
** The bonus damage is applied to [[structures]].
* ''Decisive Strike'' locks '''Garen''' out of using basic attacks for a short period of time. This is shortened with {{stil|attack speed}}.
* The enhanced attack will still complete and hit the target even if they become {{tip|untargetable}} during the {{tip|attack windup|attack's windup}}.
* ''Decisive Strike'' will not prevent the reapplication of {{tip|slow|slows}} (e.g. the persistent slow from {{ai|Pillar of Ice|Trundle}} will be immediately reapplied after removal if '''Garen''' is still within its [[area of effect]]).
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will only negate the {{tip|silence}}.
* ''Decisive Strike's'' {{tip|lunge}} can pass very thin terrain and will otherwise not be able to. In any case, '''Garen''' will still hit his target.
q1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|8|Starts post-effect}}' as '8/0' and riot's value '8,8,8,8,8' as '8'

effects.str: • Bonus Physical Damage: (+ 50% AD)
